forgot-password.body: Just enter the email address associated with the account you would like to recover.
forgot-password.heading: Forgot your password?
forgot-password.help-text: If the account exists, you will receive an email with a link to reset your password.

login.body: Please enter your username and password associated with your account to login and access, manage and share your resumes.

username.help-text: You can also enter your email address
username.label: Username

login.heading: Login to your account
login.recover-text: In case you have forgotten your password, you can <1>recover your account</1> here.
login.register-text: If you don't have one, you can <1>create an account</1> here.

register.body: Please enter your personal information to create an account.
register.heading: Create an account
register.loginText: If you already have an account, you can <1>login here</1>.

reset-password.body: Enter a new password for your account.
reset-password.heading: Reset your password

avatar.help-text: You can update your profile picture on <1>Gravatar</1>

email.label: Email Address
email.help-text: It is not possible to update your email address at the moment, please create a new account instead.

delete-account.heading: Delete Account and Data
delete-account.body: To delete your account, your data and all your resumes, type "{{keyword}}" into the textbox and click on the button. Please note that this is an irreversible action and your data cannot be retrieved again.

create-resume.body: Start building your resume by giving it a name. It could be in reference to the role you are applying for, or just your favorite snack.
create-resume.heading: Create a new resume

json-resume.body: If you have a <1>validated JSON Resume</1> ready to go, you can use it to fast-track your development on Reactive Resume. Click the button below and upload a valid JSON file to begin.
json-resume.heading: Import From JSON Resume

linkedin.body: You can save time by exporting your data from LinkedIn and using it to auto-fill fields on Reactive Resume. Head over to the <1>Data Privacy</1> section on LinkedIn and request an archive of your data. Once it is available, upload the ZIP file below.
linkedin.heading: Import From LinkedIn

reactive-resume.body: If you have a JSON that was exported with the current version of Reactive Resume, you can import it back here to get an editable version again.
reactive-resume.heading: Import From Reactive Resume
